SEARCH
Package com.example.movie_theatre.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.movie_theatre.controller.AdminController
@Controller public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class handles the requests and logic related to the admin functionalities in the movie theatre application.

  • Method Details

    • adminHome

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin") public String adminHome(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam(required=false) String keyword, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="movieTitle") String sortField, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="asc") String sortDirection)
      Displays the admin home page with a list of movies.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      keyword - the keyword to filter the movies (optional)
      sortField - the field by which the movies should be sorted (default is "movieTitle")
      sortDirection - the direction to sort the movies (default is "asc")
      Returns:
      the view name for the admin home page

    • newMovie

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin/new") public String newMovie(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the page to create a new movie.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the new movie creation page

    • saveMovie

      @PostMapping("/home/admin/save") public String saveMovie(@ModelAttribute("movie") Movie movie)
      Saves a new movie to the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to be saved
      Returns:
      a redirect to the admin home page

    • editMovie

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin/edit/{movieId}") public String editMovie(@PathVariable Integer movieId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the page to edit an existing movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to be edited
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the movie edit page

    • deleteMovie

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin/delete/{movieId}") public String deleteMovie(@PathVariable Integer movieId)
      Deletes a movie by its ID and redirects to the admin home page.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to be deleted
      Returns:
      a redirect to the admin home page

    • aboutAdmin

      @GetMapping("/home/admin/about") public String aboutAdmin(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays information about the author of application.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the about page

    • analytics

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin/analytics") public String analytics(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays movie analytics: number of movies, the oldest movie, the newest movie, and the average duration of movies.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the analytics page

    • roles

      @RequestMapping("home/admin/users") public String roles(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the list of users in the system.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the user list page

    • editUserRole

      @RequestMapping("/home/admin/editRole/{userId}") public String editUserRole(@PathVariable Integer userId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the page to edit a user's role.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose role is to be edited
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the view name for the user role edit page

    • saveUserRole

      @PostMapping("/home/admin/saveRole") public String saveUserRole(@ModelAttribute("user") MyAppUser user)
      Saves the updated role of a user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose role has been updated
      Returns:
      a redirect to the users list page
